column2: I  hold  that  the  principle  introduced  by  oadal/age  Anil Shantha  Samarasinghe  v.

column1: oadal/age Mervin Silva and Another (supra) has no  retrospective effect on this application.
Alternatively and  for the sake  of completeness,  if it is  assumed  that the  principle  laid  down  in

column2: oadal/age Ani! Shantha Samarasinghe v.  oadal/age Mervin Silva and Another (supra) is applicable

column1: to the instant action, section 68 of the Evidence Ordinance requires at least one attesting witness
